channel.title: How do I make a really old scratch server capable of npcs?
channel.description: How do I make a really old scratch server capable of npcs? Im more or less running the original winterloves. So can someone please post a tut? Thanks :DDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD)))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))

item.title: How do I make a really old scratch server capable of npcs?
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“jungledude, post:6, topic:168602”][quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=228210.msg1959406#msg1959406 date=1198900300]
runescape3 was my first server in mid 2006, i continued it till start of 07 and had 50k users.
My new server is going to be random server.
i just need a tut to make npcs on it.
[/quote]

50k users but probobably 2 of them where active?

I have well over 100,000 character files but i probably have only 50 active members…[/quote]
you didnt answer my question, please answer or do not post?

Read full topic
